BaoDian.Name: EXP Dungeon
BaoDian.Depict: You can acquire a large amount of EXP from the EXP Dungeon.

BaoDian.Name: Daily Quest
BaoDian.Depict: You can complete 20x daily quests every day.

BaoDian.Name: Meditation
BaoDian.Depict: You can acquire a large amount of EXP via Meditation even while offline.

BaoDian.Name: Statue Praise
BaoDian.Depict: Praise the statue in Lorencia to acquire a large amount of EXP.

BaoDian.Name: Cheer for Ranked Player
BaoDian.Depict: Cheer for ranked player in the ranking menu to acquire EXP.

BaoDian.Name: Illusion Temple
BaoDian.Depict: Prove your skill in the Illusion Temple to acquire a large amount of EXP and achievement points.

BaoDian.Name: Enhance Equipment
BaoDian.Depict: Enhance equipment to improve your Combat Power quickly, and add spectacular effects to your equipment.

BaoDian.Name: Enhance Equipment Options
BaoDian.Depict: You can increase attributes by enhancing options.

BaoDian.Name: Combine Equipment
BaoDian.Depict: If you have 3 of the same item, use Gems to Combine them into a higher-tier item.

BaoDian.Name: Fruit Crafting
BaoDian.Depict: You can acquire a random fruit from the Crafting menu.

BaoDian.Name: Achievement Aura
BaoDian.Depict: Stat increasing buffs are automatically activated once you complete certain achievements.

BaoDian.Name: Division
BaoDian.Depict: You can upgrade your Division via Fame.

BaoDian.Name: Create Guild
BaoDian.Depict: You can receive special buffs by using Contribution Points in the Guild Buff Menu.

BaoDian.Name: Story Dungeon
BaoDian.Depict: Complete Daily Dungeons to acquire rewards.

BaoDian.Name: Zen Dungeon
BaoDian.Depict: Complete the Zen Dungeon to acquire a large amount of Bound Zen.

BaoDian.Name: Use Gold Ingot
BaoDian.Depict: Buy Gold Ingot from the shop to acquire a large amount of Bound Zen.

BaoDian.Name: Epic Chest
BaoDian.Depict: You can acquire a variety of equipments by opening Epic Chest.

BaoDian.Name: World Boss
BaoDian.Depict: World Bosses have a very high chance of dropping premium equipment.

BaoDian.Name: Disassemble Equipment
BaoDian.Depict: You can obtain Gems by disassembling unnecessary items with NPC Raymond.

BaoDian.Name: Gem Exchange
BaoDian.Depict: You can exchange your Gems for Talismans from NPC Raymond.

BaoDian.Name: Points Exchange
BaoDian.Depict: You can exchange points you earned from opening an Epic Chest for a premium necklace and ring.

BaoDian.Name: Story Dungeon
BaoDian.Depict: Complete Daily Dungeons to acquire rewards.

BaoDian.Name: Blood Castle
BaoDian.Depict: Monsters in Blood Castle have a very high chance of dropping Jewels.

BaoDian.Name: Points Exchange
BaoDian.Depict: You can exchange points you earned from opening an Epic Chest for a premium necklace and ring.

BaoDian.Name: Endless Tower
BaoDian.Depict: Challenge yourself in the Endless Tower to acquire Condor Feather and Condorâ€™s Flame.

BaoDian.Name: Purchase Diamonds
BaoDian.Depict: You can acquire Diamonds via Purchase.

BaoDian.Name: Shop
BaoDian.Depict: You can purchase precious items from the Diamond shop.

BaoDian.Name: Pets Disassemble
BaoDian.Depict: Acquire Elemental Stones by disassembling pets.

BaoDian.Name: Contribution exchange
BaoDian.Depict: You can exchange Contribution Points for Elemental Stones and Aether Dust.

BaoDian.Name: Transmute
BaoDian.Depict: It is possible to refine equipment to Tier 11 and higher.

BaoDian.Name: Item Craft
BaoDian.Depict: You can craft Roch Feathers in the Craft menu.

BaoDian.Name: Arena
BaoDian.Depict: You can acquire Honor Points in the Arena.

BaoDian.Name: Fame Shop
BaoDian.Depict: You can exchange Honor Points for items.

BaoDian.Name: Harmageddon
BaoDian.Depict: Server Dungeon - Harmageddon Reward [Golden Relic Gift Box]

BaoDian.Name: Elemental War
BaoDian.Depict: Server Dungeon - Elemental War Reward [Soul Dust]

BaoDian.Name: Battlefield of Heroes
BaoDian.Depict: Battlefield of Heroes Reward [Golden Scripture Gift Box, Soul Dust]

BaoDian.Name: Cry Wolf
BaoDian.Depict: Server Dungeon - Cry Wolf reward [Wolf Dust]

BaoDian.Name: Primordial Fragment
BaoDian.Depict: Higher tier pieces can be obtained through crafting.

BaoDian.Name: Exchange Points
BaoDian.Depict: Great rewards will be given to those who capture a Guardian Pet

BaoDian.Name: Secret Shop
BaoDian.Depict: Great rewards awaits those in Dice Hunter.

BaoDian.Name: Land of Ordeal
BaoDian.Depict: Land of Ordeal Server Boss Battlefield

BaoDian.Name: Corps-Territory collect
BaoDian.Depict: Corps-Collect a large amount of Hallow Essence through Territory collect.

BaoDian.Name: Catch The Alphabet
BaoDian.Depict: Catch Let is get high

BaoDian.Name: Revive Shop
BaoDian.Depict: Buy a piece of stone, regain consciousness, activate the recovery device.

BaoDian.Name: Qinghai Forces
BaoDian.Depict: Many of them came out. Forces fighting for power!

BaoDian.Name: Battle Team
BaoDian.Depict: Teamwork, reconstruction, reborn!
